programme.title: It's Showtime
programme.desc: Hosted by an all-star cast, It's Showtime is a variety show unlike any other. Watch as people from all over come on stage to showcase their skills and creativity in this one-of-a-kind talent show full of fun and prizes.

programme.title: Goin' Bulilit S15
programme.desc: This comical spin-off of the 80s comedy programme Goin' Bananas is currently the Philippines' most successful children's comedy show, created and directed by one of Goin' Bananas' original stars, Bobot Mortiz.

programme.title: Lavender Fields
programme.desc: The life of a simple flower farm girl is shattered when she falls for a charming accountant, who turns out to be a married gun cartel member. Targeted for his stolen money, she loses everything she holds dear and reinvents herself to seek justice.

programme.title: FPJ's Batang Quiapo
programme.desc: A young man rises to be one of the biggest outlaws in the neighbourhood while he navigates his way in life to survive in Quiapo. Hoping to earn the affection of his parents, his feat draws him closer to the truth about his identity.

programme.title: Roja
programme.desc: A paradise like no other - La Playa Roja is your ultimate escape! But behind its beauty lies danger, and soon, you'll see RED. Are you ready for the fight to survive?

programme.title: What Lies Beneath
programme.desc: The lives of four individuals are turned upside down after they witness the murder of their friend. They band together to put the alleged killer behind bars, but years later, the imprisoned man seeks revenge, unraveling dark secrets that test their loyalty and survival.

programme.title: Pamilya Sagrado
programme.desc: Being a prominent political clan, the Sagrados want nothing but to keep their name faultless and sacred, until a controversial incident comes their way.

programme.title: TV Patrol Global Edition
programme.desc: Comprehensive and incisive, TV Patrol is the benchmark in Philippines news journalism, bringing you the most relevant news delivered by the country's best news anchors.

programme.title: You're My Boss
programme.desc: Airline company executive Georgina will do everything to close an important deal with foreign investors. However, they won't negotiate with anyone save for the big boss, who's on leave. In a desperate attempt, she introduces her assistant Pong as the president.

programme.title: Lavender Fields
programme.desc: The life of a simple flower farm girl is shattered when she falls for a charming accountant, who turns out to be a married gun cartel member. Targeted for his stolen money, she loses everything she holds dear and reinvents herself to seek justice.

programme.title: Pamilya Sagrado
programme.desc: Being a prominent political clan, the Sagrados want nothing but to keep their name faultless and sacred, until a controversial incident comes their way.

programme.title: Ngayon At Kailanman
programme.desc: Eva fights to reclaim her place in the wealthy Cortes family while searching for the truth about her identity. Fate brings her together with Inno, and their love story endures family secrets, rivalry and tragedy as they discover the real meaning of forgiveness and redemption.

programme.title: BRGY S4
programme.desc: BRGY features interesting and humorous stories about Filipinos and businesses in North America.

programme.title: TFC Kids Zone
programme.desc: A programme block filled with animated short stories, nursery rhymes and songs, as well as Filipino language lessons, TFC Kids' Zone promises a rich treasure trove of learning and discovery that parents and their young ones will find enriching and empowering.

programme.title: Kapamilya Daily Mass
programme.desc: A daily celebration of the Liturgy of the Lord.

programme.title: Gising Pilipinas
programme.desc: Spice up your morning with a rousing round-up of the biggest news stories and live reports from field correspondents.

programme.title: It's Showtime LIVE
programme.desc: Hosted by an all-star cast, It's Showtime is a variety show unlike any other. Watch as people from all over come on stage to showcase their skills and creativity in this one-of-a-kind talent show full of fun and prizes.

programme.title: Radyo Patrol Balita
programme.desc: Radyo Patrol Balita focuses on delivering the latest news, breaking events, and important issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Tandem Ng Bayan
programme.desc: Tandem Ng Bayan brings you discussions on the day's top news stories, providing analysis and engaging in commentary on political as well as social issues.

programme.title: Magandang Buhay
programme.desc: "Momshies" Jolina Magdangal, Melai Cantiveros, and Regine Velasquez kick off the day with good vibes as they share a chat with celebrities on topics easily relatable to Filipino families.

programme.title: Goin' Bulilit S15

programme.title: Everything About Her
programme.desc: A businesswoman named Vivian learns she is suffering from stage 3 cancer. She hires a private nurse Jaica to take care of her. But she plays a bigger role in Vivian's life as she becomes the bridge between the mother and her son Albert.

programme.title: Tiktoclock: Happy Hour Na
programme.desc: A game-variety show showcasing talents of Filipinos in singing, dancing and many more.

programme.title: Unica Hija
programme.desc: The tragic death of his daughter and the ensuing breakdown of his marriage leads a scientist to clone his daughter, with the hope of bringing his wife back to him. However, others take interest in his daring but morally questionable experiment, leading to his demise. Bianca, the clone, is taken in by an unsuspecting couple, and is raised as their own. Years later, the cloning is discovered. Bianca

programme.title: House Of Lies
programme.desc: It follows Marj, a woman from Cebu, doing everything to provide and care for her mother and mentally challenged brother, who would turn heartbreak and defeat as drive to work harder in the Metro and, eventually, would find love. But just when she thought she found home in the family she has created, secrets unravel and lies after lies unfold.

programme.title: Hating Kapatid
programme.desc: The series follows twin siblings Tyron and Belle, separated at birth and raised in vastly different worlds. When fate brings them together, their bond sparks a journey of discovery, love, and rivalry-- unaware of the truth that binds them.

programme.title: Sanggang
programme.desc: Two law-enforcers, each burdened by personal loss, are forced to work together when a high-profile murder implicates an action star. Their investigation unravels a deeper conspiracy linking their own families to the crimes, testing their loyalty, trust, and pursuit of justice.

programme.title: Encantadia Chronicles: Sang'gre
programme.desc: The series is a spin-off to the Philippine television fantasy drama series, Encantadia.

programme.title: Family Feud
programme.desc: It features two families who compete to name the most popular answers to survey questions in order to win cash and prizes

programme.title: Fast Talk With Boy Abunda
programme.desc: The latest multi-platform showbiz news and talk show on Kapuso network.

programme.title: 24 Oras
programme.desc: Gives an up-to-the minute news here and around the world.

programme.title: Encantadia Chronicles: Sang'gre
programme.desc: The series is a spin-off to the Philippine television fantasy drama series, Encantadia.

programme.title: Pbb Teens
programme.desc: The TV reality competition follows the same premise as its many foreign counterparts around the world wherein a number of Filipinos volunteered to live inside a house for a certain number of days.

programme.title: Pepito Manaloto, Tuloy Ang Kuwento
programme.desc: The continuing comedic chronicle of the life of Pepito Manaloto, a lucky multimillion lotto winner, his family, and the merry mix of neighbors and colleagues.

programme.title: Bblgang
programme.desc: A refreshing, exciting and funny show with an assortment of gags, spoofs, and comic performances.

programme.title: Unica Hija
programme.desc: The tragic death of his daughter and the ensuing breakdown of his marriage leads a scientist to clone his daughter, with the hope of bringing his wife back to him. However, others take interest in his daring but morally questionable experiment, leading to his demise. Bianca, the clone, is taken in by an unsuspecting couple, and is raised as their own. programme.desc: The series follows twin siblings Tyron and Belle, separated at birth and raised in vastly different worlds. When fate brings them together, their bond sparks a journey of discovery, love, and rivalry-- unaware of the truth that binds them.

programme.title: House Of Lies
programme.desc: It follows Marj, a woman from Cebu, doing everything to provide and care for her mother and mentally challenged brother, who would turn heartbreak and defeat as drive to work harder in the Metro and, eventually, would find love. But just when she thought she found home in the family she has created, secrets unravel and lies after lies unfold.

programme.title: It's Showtime
programme.desc: 'It's Showtime' is a hit variety program that thrives on spontaneity and animated conversations.

programme.title: Paikot-Ikot
programme.desc: To help combat street crime,the government forms a task force made up of narcotics agents and private detectives. Rocky and Gracia are the best investigators from the civilian group.

programme.title: Astig
programme.desc: Dennis Padilla and Janno Gibbs made their living by putting one over small time con-artists. They became very good at what they were doing so that they were soon recruited into the big-time.

programme.title: Manchichiritchit
programme.desc: The reigning Queen of Comedy, Maricel Soriano, met rapper-comedian Andrew E in this delightful tale about con artists getting a heart of gold.

programme.title: Maging Akin Ka Lamang (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The rich and beautiful Rosita would do anything to win the love of the man she had become obsessed with. Still, neither her beauty nor all the money in the world gave her what she wanted.

programme.title: Miguelito (Batang Rebelde)
programme.desc: Mayor Ven Herera (Eddie Garcia) is grooming his only son Miguelito \"Mike\" Herera (Aga Mulach) to be his predecessor. Mike, however, has other plans and live a happy go lucky life.

programme.title: Kaliwa't Kanan, Sakit Ng Katawan
programme.desc: Ruben and Lorena are still on their honeymoon stage, but she has already decided to take on family planning the natural way. Disappointed and desperate, he gets into an illicit relationship.

programme.title: Bikining Itim
programme.desc: Before Sally (Vivian Velez) leaves for Japan, she bequeaths Andoy (Joey Marquez) her black bikini to remind him of her absence, that is, in spite of his little dalliance with Tina (Cristina Gonzales).

programme.title: Kapag Wala Nang Batas
programme.desc: Gabriel (Chuck Perez) decides to enter the seminary to escape the violent world his family is involved with. But he soon realizes that he cannot totally breakout from his legacy.

programme.title: Jabidah Massacre
programme.desc: Based on the expose made by the late Senator Benigno \"Ninoy\" Aquino, Jabidah Massacre chronicles the story of how a group of recruits are turned into soldiers for a secret mission - the invasion of Sabah.

programme.title: Hanggang Dito Na Lang
programme.desc: Hilda Koronel discovered that love, fidelity and being a perfect wife and mother were not enough to keep a husband from straying.

programme.title: Alyas Waway
programme.desc: Waway was the notorious mad killer who ran circles around the people of Metro Manila during the 70's. Based on real-life events and features Cesar Montanos as Waway in one of his best performances.

programme.title: Buhay Mo'y Buhay Ko Rin
programme.desc: They're both members of the police force: he's an undercover assigned to crack a notorious syndicate, and she's a traffic officer tasked to manage the city's clogged streets.

programme.title: A E I O U
programme.desc: Five misbegotten but witty kids survived this cold-hearted community.They found their hero in the person of Captain Juan,a funny but dedicated cop.

programme.title: Afuang: Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Abner Afuang is an honest to goodness cop who labors to keep the honor of his badge. Fighting ruthless criminals, he has acquired the fury of the syndicates he is fighting.

programme.title: Abrakadabra
programme.desc: Dolphy is a poor man who finds a jar which turns out to be the home of a genie (Jimmy Santos).

programme.title: Ang Babaeng Nawawala Sa Sarili
programme.desc: Dina Bonnevie plays Alvina, a young woman from a religious and conservative family, who was thought by everyone to be mad, but is in truth, being possessed by the devil.

programme.title: Tropang Bulilit
programme.desc: Ric Rodrigo dies and he leaves his five children orphaned. The siblings miss each other so much they escape from their new homes and try their luck in Manila. As the kids go on one misadventure to another, their uncle, Lloyd Samartino is going out of his mind looking for them.

programme.title: Kakaibang Karisma
programme.desc: Confined within the gripping walls of self-deprivation, disturbed by disquieting dreams and erotic fantasies, mysteroius and hauntingly beautiful Karla Estrada plays the girl with inexplicably bewitching charm in this quirky movie.

programme.title: Unang Tibok
programme.desc: Alona (Miya Nolasco) feels suffocated by her mother's overprotectiveness. Deprived of male company, she answers the first guy who counts her. In trying to control her daughter, the more she is losing her now.

programme.title: Antipolo Massacre
programme.desc: Based on a true to life story of Cecilia Masagca Antipolo Massacre is one of the most vindictive and brutal films of 1994. Possessed by an evil spirit lurked into his soul, Winifredo (Cesar Montano) brought misery and affliction to his once happy and contented family life.

programme.title: Extranghero
programme.desc: After causing a series of troubles in his hometown, Botong (Andrew E) leaves for Manila to look for his long-lost mother. But he ends up in a mental asylum where he meets the beautiful Kristy.

programme.title: Kailan Sasabihing Mahal Kita? (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: This is all about a marriage,which started on the wrong foot. Compromised by her boyfriend, Sharon agreed to marry family friend, Christopher, in order to save face.

programme.title: Sa Diyos Lang Ako Susuko
programme.desc: Romano disobeyed his father when he became a soldier. The old man believed that peace could only be attained if people were to avoid all forms of violence. How ironic for him then to come home and find his father murdered and the criminals unknown and unpunished?

programme.title: Takas Sa Impiyerno
programme.desc: Hell is what the residents call their town. It is because Mayor Sebastian (Paquito Diaz) virtually sees the town as his own personal kingdom.
